H0.text: Greek philosopher Socrates was sentenced to death by drinking which kind of poison . Aconitine

H1.text: Greek philosopher Socrates was sentenced to death by drinking which kind of poison . Cyanide

H2.text: Greek philosopher Socrates was sentenced to death by drinking which kind of poison . Opium

H3.text: Greek philosopher Socrates was sentenced to death by drinking which kind of poison . Hemlock

A4.text: The jurors favoured the death penalty by making him drink a cup of hemlock (a poisonous liquid).

A5.text: He died the next morning, in accordance with his sentence, after drinking poison hemlock.
